computation.name: Laplace equation with Dirichlet on the boundary

computation:
* Domain: Square :math:`[0, 1]\times[0, 1]` meshed by triangles. * Operator: Laplace operator :math:`-\Delta u`. * Reference solution: :math:`(X, Y)\mapsto \sin(\pi X)\sin(\pi Y)`. * Boundary conditions: Dirichlet condition on the whole boundary with data automatically computed. * Right-hand side: automatically computed.
1.0 + (X >= 0.5)*(Y >= 0.5) + (X < 0.5)*(Y < 0.5)
sin(pi*X)*sin(pi*Y)
